response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is truly a game-changer in its field. It comes with a wealth of features designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. However, I understand everyone has different perspectives on value. Therefore, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $85. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the product retails for significantly higher elsewhere. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 85}
